metadata.title: CVE-2024-57850 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jffs2: Prevent rtime decompress memory corruptionThe rtime decompression routine does not fully check bounds during theentirety of the decompression pass and can corrupt memory outside thedecompression buffer if the compressed data is corrupted. This adds therequired check to prevent this failure mode.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
